markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scizore of the Crab](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1887)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 36 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn on 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Scizore](/Weapons.aspx?ID=303)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _scizore of the crab_ is a _+1 [scizore](/Weapons.aspx?ID=303)_ that has the [grapple](/Traits.aspx?ID=184) trait in addition to its normal weapon traits.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))   **Requirements** Your last action was a successful Strike with this weapon, or you have a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) with this weapon; **Effect** The target is grabbed until the end of your next turn. A grabbed creature can use the [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) action to get out of the Grab, and the Grab ends for a grabbed creature if you move away from it. This functions as the [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) creature ability.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per round;  **Requirements** You have a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) with this weapon; **Effect** The crab claw animates and pinches open and shut, dealing slashing damage equal to the _scizore of the crab's_ number of damage dice.

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include a claw from a [giant crab](/Monsters.aspx?ID=588) or similar creature.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Scizore of the Crab
